entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
